amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase Bureau of Land Management funding for Wildland Fire Management by $23 million and decrease Bureau of Land Management funding for Land Acquisition by $36 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase BLM funding for Wildland Fire Management by $23 million and decrease BLM funding for Land Acquisition by $36 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 269 (Roll no. 317).
